013package org.apache.juneau.internal;
014
015import java.util.*;
016import java.util.concurrent.*;
017import java.util.function.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
023
024/**
025 * Various generic object utility methods.
026 *
027 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
028 * </ul>
029 */
030public class Utils2 extends Utils {
031
032   /**
033    * If the specified object is a {@link Supplier} or {@link Value}, returns the inner value, otherwise the same value.
034    *
035    * @param o The object to unwrap.
036    * @return The unwrapped object.
037    */
038   public static Object unwrap(Object o) {
039      if (o instanceof Supplier)
040         o = unwrap(((Supplier<?>)o).get());
041      if (o instanceof Value)
042         o = unwrap(((Value<?>)o).get());
043      if (o instanceof Optional)
044         o = unwrap(((Optional<?>)o).orElse(null));
045      return o;
046   }
047
048   /**
049    * Converts the specified object into an identifiable string of the form "Class[identityHashCode]"
050    * @param o The object to convert to a string.
051    * @return An identity string.
052    */
053   public static String identity(Object o) {
054      if (o instanceof Optional)
055         o = ((Optional<?>)o).orElse(null);
056      if (o == null)
057         return null;
058      return ClassInfo.of(o).getShortName() + "@" + System.identityHashCode(o);
059   }
060
061   private static final ConcurrentHashMap<Class<?>,Map<String,MethodInfo>> PROPERTIES_METHODS = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
062
063   /**
064    * Searches for all <c>properties()</c> methods on the specified object and creates a combine map of them.
065    *
066    * @param o The object to return a property map of.
067    * @return A new property map.
068    */
069   public static JsonMap toPropertyMap(Object o) {
070      if (o == null)
071         return null;
072      Map<String,MethodInfo> methods = PROPERTIES_METHODS.get(o.getClass());
073      if (methods == null) {
074         ClassInfo ci = ClassInfo.of(o);
075         Map<String,MethodInfo> methods2 = new LinkedHashMap<>();
076         do {
077            String cname = ci.getShortName();
078            MethodInfo mi = ci.getDeclaredMethod(x -> x.hasName("properties"));
079            if (mi != null)
080               methods2.put(cname, mi.accessible());
081            ci = ci.getSuperclass();
082         } while (ci != null);
083         methods = methods2;
084         PROPERTIES_METHODS.put(o.getClass(), methods);
085      }
086      JsonMap m = JsonMap.create().append("id", identity(o));
087      methods.forEach((k,v) -> m.put(k, v.invoke(o)));
088      return m;
089   }
090}
